title: Client bug fixed!!
body: To all the people complain about the black screen bug, i have a solution for you! Go to your files. Search to Riot Games/ League Of Legends/ RADS/ System/user.cfg. Open the last file with note pad. Change the setting to leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no. It worked perfectly for me :P
